DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to look at the preliminary safety profile of an investigational drug in children 1 to < 3 months of age with bronchiolitis.
DOC.brief_title: Safety and Pk Study in 1- to 3- Month-Old Children With Bronchiolitis (0476-297)
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria : Active bronchiolitis and a history of bronchiolitis and asthmalike symptoms. Exclusion Criteria : Anemia or history of any significant illness that will pose additional risk to the patient.
